Friendship gathering held
articles.content:
Friendship gathering held 
    Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A friendship gathering with Canadians staying in the DPRK took place at the Pyongyang Embroidery Institute on July 1 on the occasion of the Day of Canada.
 Present there were officials concerned, members of the Korea-Canada Friendship Association and employees of the institute. 
 Being briefed on the fact that the institute has developed the Korean embroidery, preserving the Juche character and national character, the participants looked round embroidery rooms and talked with each other, deepening the feelings of friendship.

Greetings to Belorussian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Belorussian Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK cabinet Hong Song Nam sent a message of greetings to Belorussian Prime Minister Gennady Novitsky on the occasion of its National Day.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily develop in the desire and fundamental interests of the two peoples, the message wished him success in his work.    
 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Belorussian counterpart Sergei Martinov on this occasion.
